sentences.en: "Had I known as much half an hour ago--But since I AM here, "--speakingwith a forced vivacity as he returned to his seat--"what does itsignify?
sentences.cn: 鷾“我若是半个小时以前得知这些情况—一可是既然我已经来了”—一他又回到座位上，装作快活的样子说道—一“这又有什么关系呢？

sentences.en: Exuding a fresh national flavor , these works showed the continued vivacity of musical creation in China.
sentences.cn: 这些舞剧、音乐更具有崭新的鲜明的民族个性, 显示着音乐创作的勃勃生机.

sentences.en: He had been talking , all day, on many subjects, and with unusual vivacity.
sentences.cn: 他已经谈了一天, 谈各种问题, 非常兴奋.

sentences.en: He seems to have more length of limb than vivacity of blood or vigour of brain.
sentences.cn: 他四肢的修长似乎胜过了精力的旺盛和脑子的灵活.

sentences.en: He was charmed by her vivacity and high spirits.
sentences.cn: 她的活泼与兴高采烈的情绪把他迷住了.

sentences.en: He was vivacity and high spirits.
sentences.cn: 与兴高采烈的情绪把他迷住了.

sentences.en: Her charm resides in her vivacity.
sentences.cn: 她的魅力存在于她的活泼.

sentences.en: It was , perhaps , Archer reflected, because her early vivacity had disappeared.
sentences.cn: 阿切尔心想, 也许是因为她过去的欢乐已经不复存在了.

sentences.en: Lianzhu is the combination of stylistic vivacity and seriousness.
sentences.cn: 连珠体是游戏体裁与严肃主题的结合体.

sentences.en: Love is passion, vivacity, spry and warm.
sentences.cn: 爱是热情 、 活泼 、 充满生气而又温暖的.

sentences.en: Only in his conversation did he display interest and vivacity.
sentences.cn: 他只是在同人交谈时,才表示出一点高兴和活跃的神态.

sentences.en: The Irish are charm and vivacity.
sentences.cn: 爱尔兰人充满魅力,生性活泼.

sentences.en: Then your looks and movements will have more vivacity and variety than they dare offer now.
sentences.cn: 那时候,你的神情和动作就会比现在敢流露出来的更有生气,更有变化.

sentences.en: This picture catches the innocent vivacity of children.
sentences.cn: 这幅画把儿童天真活泼的神态画得惟妙惟肖.

sentences.en: This sharp vivacity of soul , and the supple and restless volubility attending it, disturb our negotiations.
sentences.cn: 才思太过敏捷, 锋芒过于显露, 是人与人之间沟通交流的一大障碍.

sentences.en: We were all affected by the vivacity of this lovely little boy.
sentences.cn: 这个可爱的小男孩的快活使我们都受到感染。

sentences.en: We were all affected By the vivacity of this lovely little Boy.
sentences.cn: 这个可爱的小男孩的快活使我们都受到感染.

words.tran_cn: 活泼的；快活的；有生气的

trans.tran_en: If you say that someone has vivacity, you mean that they are lively, exciting, and attractive
